Creators

For game developers, we offer an SDK to add aromas to your games and experiences. We also offer to do it for you in a short time. Together with you, we will select five smells that will emphasize the atmosphere of your game.

Про то что есть инструмент на моб

Will enhance your gameplay by engaging your sense of smell and creating a more immersive and captivating experience in the adventure games

For game developers, we offer an SDK to add aromas to your games and experiences. Together we will select five smells that will emphasize the atmosphere of your game.

For perfumers, we offer a new niche for creativity. We will provide you with testers and supplies so you can create unique collections for different games, experiences and presentations.

VR content producers with the help of Smell Editor will be able to fill their films with smells. It's very simple and funny. We also offer to do it for you in a short time free of charge.
